input.sentences: i went to the memorial service yesterday .
they were very careful with the flag .
they raised it to the top of the pole .
i had a great time there and we saluted it .
output.sentences: Yesterday there was a service held for Memorial Day.
Veterans dressed in uniform began the ceremony.
I watched how they handled the flag in a careful way during the unfolding ritual.
The top officer raised it, and up the pole it went.
Time seemed to stand still as the bugler played, and everyone saluted.
